available_tasks.browse:
search a query on your default browse.
--->Usage: $ browse <query>
available_tasks.play:
play youtube in defaultl browser.
--->Usage: $ play <youtube video>
available_tasks.define:
search for a meaning in Oxford dict.
--->Usage: $ define <word/phrase>
available_tasks.wiki:
search for a wiki summary.
--->Usage: $ wiki <topic>
available_tasks.notes:
take notes on terminal.
--->For more Usage info: $ notes
available_tasks.cal:
display calendar for a given month.
--->Usage: $cal <month> <year>
